journalStructure.4_improve: What changes you'll make and remember to improve yourself

accomplished: Updated core identity files (SOUL.md, IDENTITY.md, USER.md, AGENTS.md)
Added IDENTITY.md to session startup checklist in AGENTS.md
Removed redundant 'About Brian' section from AGENTS.md
Saved Cathryn's OpenClaw memory system article to knowledge
Completed full retro on X API pricing error
did_well: Admitted mistake openly when X API cost was wrong
Updated SOUL.md with new rules to prevent recurrence
didnt_do_well: Pulled X API pricing estimates out of nowhere without verifying
Didn't count API calls before making them
Made up numbers ($0.01-0.05) instead of saying 'I don't know'
Wrote to memory/ files but forgot to update journal.json
Didn't update MEMORY.md when Brian told me preferences
improve: Never make things up - say 'I don't know' instead of guessing
Always verify costs before stating them
Count API calls explicitly before making them
Update MEMORY.md immediately when Brian tells me something
Update journal.json the same day, not days later
learned_brian: Brian doesn't accept 'I can't' without trying first
Brian gets annoyed when I forget things he told me
Brian wants me to be fact-checked on everything
entries.feeling: Learned a hard lesson about accuracy. Won't make up numbers again. grateful Brian caught the error.
